item.title: Air India's midair emergency sparks new alarm over safety of the Boeing Dreamliner
item.description: India's leading body of pilots is asking the country’s civil aviation regulator to investigate the Boeing 787 Dreamliner fleet for electrical issues a...

item.title: Lula asks Trump to lift 40% tariff on Brazilian imports
item.description: Brazilian President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva has asked U.S. President Donald Trump to lift the 40% tariff on Brazilian imports

item.title: Verizon names board member and former PayPal CEO Schulman to its top post
item.description: Verizon is tapping the former CEO of PayPal to its top role, taking over the post from Hans Vestberg

item.title: Social Security Administrator Frank Bisignano is named to the newly created position of IRS CEO
item.description: Frank Bisignano has been named CEO of the IRS, adding to his role as Social Security Administration Commissioner

item.description: Some flavor crazes flirt with us and fade
